short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read & post comments while watching videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance YouTube with YoutubeBoosted!

Tired of toggling between comments and videos?  YoutubeBoosted is your one-stop shop for a richer YouTube experience. This browser extension brings everything you need to the side bar, eliminating the need for endless scrolling.

Features:
- Seamless Commenting: Read and react to comments while the video plays, keeping the conversation flowing.
- Quick Access Side Bar: Effortlessly explore related videos, live chats, and playlists – all conveniently located next to the video.
- Focus on What Matters: Stay immersed in the video without distractions. No more switching tabs or getting lost in the comment section.

With YouTubeBoosted, you can:

    Gain deeper insights from comments while you watch.
    Discover new content through related videos, all within a glance.
    Engage with live chats without missing a beat.
    Navigate playlists with ease, keeping your viewing organized.

How to install:

Add the extension to your browser and that's it! Every time you go on YouTube the extension will do it's job. If it doesn't then you may need to allow permissions for the extension to access the browser.

Notes:
If there are any issues that comes up just refresh the browser and that will most likely solve it
